titleStmt.title: A sermon against the anti-Scripturists also another concerning the sinfulness, danger, and remedies of infidelity, preached at White-Hall / by Seth Lord Bishop of Sarum.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Seth, 1617-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for James Collins ...,

notesStmt.note: Each sermon has special t.p. and separate paging.
Wing W827 (A sermon against the anti-Scripturists) and W819 (Concerning the sinfulness) appear bound together at reels 402:31 and 905:4.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
On reel 905:3, W827 incorrectly called W812.
